The waiter opened your table on the computer in Erkypper in front of you and told you the amount of your bill while it was being printed! You were  outraged by the amount of the bill! But, the waiter explained the menu to you that the fish is priced as to the weight you order. You ordered a whole fish. The whole fish weighs 700 grams.
